outline: Gilgal = "a wheel, rolling" the first site of an Israelite camp west of the Jordan, east of Jericho, here Samuel was judge, and Saul was made king; later used for illicit worship dwelling place of prophets in northern Israel about four miles (7 km) from Shiloh and Bethel a region conquered by Joshua, site unsure
